trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="<system.identityModel.services>" /> section in a configuration file.
The `<system.identityModel.services>` section configures authentication using WS-Federation protocol.
trans-unit.target: Il `<system.identityModel.services>` sezione Configura l'autenticazione utilizzando il protocollo WS-Federation.

trans-unit.source: It contains elements that configure the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> (WSFAM) and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> (SAM).
trans-unit.target: Contiene elementi che configurano il <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> (WSFAM) e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> (SAM).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection" /> class.
Gets a reference to the <see langword="<system.identityModel.services>" /> section from the configuration file.
The <see langword="<system.identityModel.services>" /> section from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Il <see langword="<system.identityModel.services>" /> sezione dal file di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> if the configuration file does not contain a <see langword="<system.identityModel.services>" /> section.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> Se il file di configurazione non contiene un <see langword="<system.identityModel.services>" /> sezione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unnamed <see langword="<federationConfiguration>" /> element from the configuration file.
The unnamed <see langword="<federationConfiguration>" /> element from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Senza il nome <see langword="<federationConfiguration>" /> elemento dal file di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> if the configuration file does not contain a <see langword="<system.identityModel.services>" /> section.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> Se il file di configurazione non contiene un <see langword="<system.identityModel.services>" /> sezione.

trans-unit.source: The unnamed `<federationConfiguration>` element does not have its `name` attribute set (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `null`).
trans-unit.target: Senza il nome `<federationConfiguration>` elemento non è relativo `name` set di attributi (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà `null`).

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see langword="<federationConfiguration>" /> elements configured in this <see langword="<system.identityModel.services>" /> section.
A collection that contains all of the <see langword="<federationConfiguration>" /> elements configured in this <see langword="<system.identityModel.services>" /> section.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta che contiene tutte le <see langword="<federationConfiguration>" /> elementi configurati in questa <see langword="<system.identityModel.services>" /> sezione.

trans-unit.source: A constant that defines the name of the configuration section; "system.identityModel.services".
